sentences.cn: 一位端庄优雅的高挑女子
她有着一头深褐色头发，身材高挑。

sentences.en: She was a tall, statuesque, rather silent woman with slow movements and magnificent fair hair.
sentences.cn: 她个子又高,长相又美, 寡言少语,动作缓慢,一头漂亮的金发.

sentences.en: Typography with anything to say therefore aspires to a kind of statuesque transparency.
sentences.cn: 因此,任何具备内容的文字都向往一种雕塑般的透明度.

words.tran_cn: 雕像般的；轮廓清晰的；均衡的

trans.tran_cn: 雕塑般的，庄严的，轮廓优美的，轮廓清晰的
trans.tran_en: large and beautiful in an impressive way, like a statue
